name: Acolyte
description: You have spent your life in service to a temple, learning sacred rites and providing sacrifices to the divine.
feature_description: You and your companions can expect free healing and care at temples of your faith. You are also respected by those who share your faith.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you aid a fellow devotee of your faith or perform a significant religious rite.

name: Charlatan
description: You're an expert in deception and manipulation, always ready with a scheme or con.
feature_description: You have created a second identity that includes documentation, established acquaintances, and disguises.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you successfully deceive someone with lasting consequences.

name: Criminal
description: You are an experienced criminal with a history of breaking the law.
feature_description: You have a reliable contact who acts as your liaison to a network of criminals.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you pull off a successful heist or evade the law.

name: Entertainer
description: You thrive in front of an audience, skilled in performance and captivating crowds.
feature_description: You can always find a place to perform and receive free lodging in return.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever your performance moves an audience to tears or applause.

name: Folk Hero
description: You're a champion of the common people, known for heroic deeds.
feature_description: Common folk will shelter and aid you as long as you defend them.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you defend common folk from oppression or danger.

name: Guild Artisan
description: You are a member of a guild, skilled in a particular craft or trade.
feature_description: Your guild provides lodging, legal aid, and influence in your field.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you create a masterpiece or uphold your guild's reputation.

name: Hermit
description: You lived in seclusion, seeking spiritual enlightenment or hidden knowledge.
feature_description: You uncovered a great philosophical truth or ancient secret.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you act on your philosophical beliefs or share hidden knowledge.

name: Noble
description: You were born into privilege and authority, trained to lead.
feature_description: People of high society recognize your status and defer to you.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you use your status to aid others or uphold honor.

name: Outlander
description: You grew up in the wilds, far from civilization, surviving by your wits.
feature_description: You have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and can always find food and water.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you survive a life-threatening situation in the wild.

name: Sage
description: You spent years learning the lore of the multiverse.
feature_description: When you don't know a piece of lore, you often know where and from whom it can be obtained.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you uncover lost knowledge or solve an ancient mystery.

name: Soldier
description: You served in a military force, learning discipline and combat.
feature_description: Soldiers recognize your authority and will offer aid or information.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you show leadership in battle or protect your comrades.

name: Urchin
description: You grew up on the streets, surviving by cunning and speed.
feature_description: You know the secret patterns and flow of cities and can find passages others would miss.
inspiration: You gain inspiration whenever you help the downtrodden or escape a dangerous urban situation.
